body: I think this is important. Debugging is also very important. From what I understand this is the issue of two users with different goroots set. Renaming of a module/forking it to a new repo name would not be supported. So, is the question how to share debug information? How to relate debug information created in one root to another root? If you are in the same root as the debug info was created it would be nice if we could strip out all the stuff outside the root.
